app.name: wudump
app.short_description: dump raw images from a wiiu disc
app.long_description:
Download and run the .elf from homebrew launcher with a sd card/usb device inserted that has at least 23.3gb free. The files will be dumped in 2gb parts, unless you are dumping your disc to a NTFS partion, you will have to merge them yourself afterwards.
A full dump can take a little over one and a half hours. After it has been dumped the wud parts and the key.bin will be in a wudump folder on your sd card/usb device.
